Ftp server how to
[Update howto]

Ftp server how to
We configure vsftpd to only allow anonymous user to login.
So the name of allow to login user is ftp.And the default directory of the user ftp, is /home/ftp.

We mount tmpfs filesystem on /home/ftp.
So the ftp client upload file will be stored in the ram.
The memory size of cit200 is 32MB,it's enough to store kernel image, rootfs or cit200 application.

NOTE:we always get the update package on the /home/ftp.
